content: Sure, but the PRC isn’t exactly Easter Island. “As the most populous country in the world and third largest in area, China also has the largest number of neighbours (14) sharing its 22,000km land borders namely: North Korea, Russia, Mongolia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Afghanistan, Pakistan, India, Nepal, Bhutan, Myanmar, Laos and Vietnam.” Plenty of neighbors. Unlike, say, the USA that only has 2 neighbors.
